title: 693: BITCOIN CAN ‘GO UP SIGNIFICANTLY,’ SAYS CIO OF WORLDS’S LARGEST ASSET MANAGER BLACKROCK!!!!
description:
Rick Rieder, Blackrock’s CIO was asked Friday in an interview with CNBC about his view on Bitcoin now that the crypto is legal tender in El Salvador.

"Part of why I own a small piece of BTC is I do think there are more people who are going to enter that fray over time … I like assets that are volatile that have upside convexity. I could see Bitcoin go up significantly."

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net

content:encoded:
Rick Rieder, Blackrock’s CIO was asked Friday in an interview with CNBC about his view on Bitcoin now that the crypto is legal tender in El Salvador. "Part of why I own a small piece of BTC is I do think there are more people who are going to enter that fray over time … I like assets that are volatile that have upside convexity. I could see Bitcoin go up significantly." For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
